thread.title: California craft beer brewers balance drafts and drought
thread.title_full: California craft beer brewers balance drafts and drought - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: California craft beer brewers balance drafts and drought
text: Bottles of beer move along during bottling at Stone Brewing Co., on Wednesday in Escondido In an effort to reduce water use, the brewery is spending $1 million on expanding its $8 million wastewater treatment system installed in 2008, and aims to use only three gallons of water for every gallon of beer it produces. Gregory Bull â€” The Associated Press
